chinese: n.盘子，碟子 凶电镀
english: plate

chinese: 木桌上有一个空盘子。
english: There is an empty plate on the wooden table

chinese: vt.评估
english: assess

chinese: 你对这次投资的风险评估是怎样的？低风险、中风险，还是高风险？
english: How do you assess the risk level of this investment

chinese: Y绑架；诱拐
english: kidnap

chinese: 女孩被一个强壮的男人绑架了。
english: The girl was kidnapped by a strong male

chinese: n传单，散页的印刷品
english: leaflet

chinese: 她正认真地看传单。
english: She is reading the leaflet attentively

chinese: n. 复杂精细
english: intricacy

chinese: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。
english: The price depends on the intricacy of the work

chinese: n.附近地区；近邻
english: vicinity

chinese: 这些房子都在医院附近。
english: These houses are in the vicinity of the hospital

chinese: n.光谱；范围；系列
english: spectrum

chinese: 如果你让光穿过棱镜，你会看到整个可见光谱。
english: If you pass light through a prism, you can see the entire visual spectrum

chinese: n. 老套的模式，陈规 对……产生成
english: stereotype

chinese: 韩剧有三种经典的套路。
english: There are three typical stereotypes of South Korean TV shows

chinese: adj. 整个的 n.整体 adv.完全，整个
english: whole

chinese: 男孩自己吃了一整个西瓜。
english: The boy ate the whole watermelon by himself

chinese: acv.仅仅，只不过
english: merely

chinese: 这次受伤不严重，只是一个小伤口而已。
english: It's not a serious injury, but merely a cut

chinese: ad）.重大的，有意义的
english: significant

chinese: 那是很重要的日子，因为我们在那天结婚了！
english: It's a significant day because we get married on that day

chinese: n.刺激，激励；鼓励
english: incentive

chinese: 胡萝卜激励着马前行。
english: The carrot serves as an incentive to drive the horse

chinese: n.反供
english: feedback

chinese: 一个男人通过在笑脸框里打钩给出了反馈。
english: A man gave his feedback by ticking a smile box

chinese: n. 诉讼，诉讼案件
english: lawsuit

chinese: 他们已经就房产纠纷问题提起了诉讼。
english: They have filed a lawsuit against the property dispute

chinese: adv. 内在地
english: intrinsically

chinese: 尽管猴子很顽皮，但他本质上是善良的。
english: Although he can be naughty, the monkey is intrinsically kind and good-hearted

chinese: m人性；人类；人道，慈爱；（复数）
english: humanity

chinese: 人类之所以存在，是因为有这些共同的人道精
english: Mankind exists because of those common humanity
